&#8212; &#160; The Nasdaq Stock Market LLC &#160; &#160; Indicate by check mark whether the Registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160; &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#160;5.03 Amendments to Articles of Incorporation or Bylaws; Change in Fiscal Year. On August&#160;3, 2020, Apple Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221;) filed with the Secretary of State of the State of California an amendment to its Restated Articles of Incorporation to increase the number of shares of common stock, par value $0.00001 per share, that Apple is authorized to issue from 12,600,000,000 to 50,400,000,000 and to provide that as of 5&#160;p.m., Pacific daylight time, on August&#160;28, 2020, each share of common stock outstanding shall be automatically, and with no further action by the holder of such share, split into four shares of common stock. The foregoing description is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the Restated Articles of Incorporation, a copy of which is attached hereto as Exhibit 3.1 and is incorporated herein by reference. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &#160; (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit Number &#160;&#160; Exhibit Description &#160;&#160;3.1 &#160;&#160; Restated Articles of Incorporation of Apple Inc. filed on August 3, 2020 104 &#160;&#160; Inline XBRL for the cover page of this Current Report on Form 8-K.
